name: Alien 3 - Rescue Team (GBC) (Jam Game)
description:
This game was made for the Space themed Horror Jam

You are part of the rescue team and you will have to enter a spaceship, where a catastrophe occurred...

Turn down the volume before playing, this is my first GBC project with music made by me and despite the attempts the music of the game is very basic and repetitive (Please understand the limitations of the Game Boy and mine)
